entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
